SummaryEnglish: At Gloria Private Academy, where stars are born, Beethoven was a fighter, until music chose him. In the prestigious music department, students who match the talent of legendary musicians inherit their gifts and names. Trading his gloves for melodies, he steps into a world where notes hit harder than fists, determined to win the ultimate competition.

1.SummaryEnglish: An injured boxer transfers to Gloria Academy and ends up in the music dept. to find he has a "gift."

2.TitleEnglish: Emotion 02: Nachtmusik Will Change Into Wings
2.SummaryEnglish: Mozart was offered to write music for ice skater, Misha Cartin. Will he be able to impress the Ice Prince?

3.TitleEnglish: Emotion 3: Reality Through the Filtered Lens
3.SummaryEnglish: After scoring low on his exam, Beethoven gets appointed a tutor by Miharagi. And that tutor is… Chopin?!

4.TitleEnglish: Emotion 04: Tonight, Enjoy a Playful Dream
4.SummaryEnglish: Frustrated, Beethoven runs into Liszt, who sheds a new light on his situation. Will Beethoven find his path?

5.SummaryEnglish: Now that Beethoven has decided to join, he must prove to his teammates how serious he is by writing a song.

6.SummaryEnglish: It's showtime. Beethoven must make up for lost time as they practice their routine for the preliminaries.

7.SummaryEnglish: The group feels hopeless as tension rises between the members. Will a trip to the hot springs reunite them?

8.SummaryEnglish: Qualifying in the preliminary, the group is ready to move on, except Liszt. Will Gran★MyStar lose a member?!

9.SummaryEnglish: Every time Chopin sees his own reflection, he refuses to look. Will he be able to fight off his inner demons?

10.SummaryEnglish: Mozart's traumatic past is triggered when "he" appears. Will Mozart overcome it and look to the future?

11.TitleEnglish: Emotion 11: Light Up the Love for Music in This Beat
11.SummaryEnglish: The spotlight turns back to Beethoven and the team's efforts to rekindle their musical spark ahead of the final showcase. Rivalries heat up, unexpected guests return, and the characters confront their own creative blockages.

12.SummaryEnglish: With Beethoven critically injured, will Gran★MyStar be able to perform at the finals and surpass DIs=Cord?!

13.SummaryEnglish: As the last performers, will Gran★MyStar manage to take the top?! The world is in for a surprise.
